-- | AMQP-based transport layer for distributed-process (aka Cloud Haskell)
--   
@package network-transport-amqp
@version 0.1.0.0

module Network.Transport.AMQP
createTransport :: AMQPParameters -> IO Transport
data AMQPParameters
AMQPParameters :: Connection -> !Text -> !(Maybe Text) -> AMQPParameters
transportConnection :: AMQPParameters -> Connection
transportMultiCastEndpoint :: AMQPParameters -> !Text

-- | The queue and exchange name. If not specified, will be randomised.
transportEndpoint :: AMQPParameters -> !(Maybe Text)
